alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 1:48AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY OVERNIGHT... HAZARDS...The combination of bands of heavy snow and winds gusting to 60 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within these bands are often LESS than a quarter mile. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 145 AM EST, bands of heavy snow covered most of Jefferson county from about Adams to the St Lawrence River. These bands are expected to remain nearly stationary through 4 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Henderson Harbor, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, Adams Center, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville, Philadelphia, Brownville and Alexandria Bay. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard conditions. &&
